text: If a Man Answers is a 1962 American romantic comedy movie directed by Henry Levin and was based on the novel of the same name by Winifred Wolfe. It stars Bobby Darin, Sandra Dee, Micheline Presle, John Lund, Cesar Romero, Stefanie Powers, John Bleifer and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * ==References== Category:1962 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Henry Levin Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in New York City
title: If a Man Answers
